text: Julien Sanchez (born 19 October 1983) is a French politician. A member of the Front National since 2000, he has been its spokesperson since 2017. He is also mayor of Beaucaire (Gard) and president of the Rassemblement National group at the regional council of Occitanie. == Biography == Sanchez was born on 19 October 1983 in Argenteuil, Val-d'Oise.Fabrice Dubault, « Gillet candidat à Nîmes, Sanchez à Beaucaire et probablement Collard à Saint-Gilles », France 3 Languedoc-Roussillon, 27 september 2013. He joined the National Front in 2000, at the age of 16.Christel Brigaudeau, « Parents gauchistes, fils frontiste », Le Parisien, 13 february 2008.. In the 2014 municipal election in Beaucaire, the list he is leading leads the second round in a quadrangular format, with 39.8% of the votes.. ==References== * This article is a translation of the French article titled Julien Sanchez Category:1983 births Category:People from Argenteuil Category:Politicians from Île-de-France Category:Living people
title: Julien Sanchez
